Please keep exploring Programming Hero and keep supporting us.

Thank you.
Love from Team Programming Hero. ‚ù§Ô∏è", 'modified': '2020-09-12T13:09:25Z'}
review:
Im currently a student who is going to a university for a computer science degree, so I've had my fair share of different ways programming is taught. I recently had a hard time getting into my degree thanks to the change of pace COVID brought, and I was looking for a tutor originally but instead found this app. I am so glad I found it, this has saved me from paying for an expensive tutor and has improved my understanding of programming. 

There are minor bugs I have found, such as: when you get to certain points in the building of ‚Äòyour game‚Äô sometimes you won‚Äôt be able to take an action (e.g. shoot a missile at the planet); also when you do the challenges, sometimes even if you click the correct answer it will say you clicked the wrong one and you‚Äôll get it wrong either way. 

Overall amazing app and I would recommend this to any student or person who is trying to get into coding. I‚Äôve spent thousands on professors that couldn‚Äôt teach what this app can.
title: Amazing way to teach, but some minor bugs

review:
It is an amazing app. I never thought that coding would be this much fun to learn, now I am sooo into coding. Because of this app. Good job‚ô•Ô∏è
But there is a problem I just can‚Äôt complete the Paragraph tags in EXPLORE HTML. It gave me three options but whatever I choose, is wrong even if it is the right answer. So basically I am stuck.
Please do something about this I really want to learn more but I can‚Äôt.
But apart from that, you are doing an amazing work keep it up‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è
title: An awesome app but the bugs ar really annoying.

review: This app is really helpful to learn programming. They teach you step by step and make your basic clear. At first you don‚Äôt need to waste your money by taking courses to learn basic of programming in other websites this app gives it for free!! It has no adds too.

review:
Great concept and beautiful UI. Programming is difficult to learn and typos in the teaching material can lead to way more confusion. One example is in the js fundamentals ‚Äúarray‚Äù lesson. Throughout the course it is correctly using [ ] for an array but the final question uses ( ) for all the multiple choice answers. Also in the ES6 template strings lesson they have the the formatting as {$} in the introduction when the correct formatting is ${} which they show later.
Small things but this could cause newer programmers frustration and confusion.
title: Typos and

review: I love this application. It really puts Python in a different perspective and helps me understand it better. I will definitely be putting this application on my children phones. Thank you and your team for an amazing application. Keep up the great work!

developerResponse: {'id': 21684828, 'body': 'We are working on the graphics. You will get is fix on next release.\nWe are extremely sorry for the inconvenience.', 'modified': '2021-03-16T12:58:35Z'}
review:
Invested a lot of time in the app and got pretty far into it (as a paying customer). The concepts then became harder (as expected) and the language errors along with non functionality of graphics became a hindering factor in learning. 

Emailed support multiple times to provide feedback on issues and the common response has been ‚Äúwe will fix it soon‚Äù.

 It has been over 3 months and the delay has prevented progress which has also resulted in forgetting previous concepts learned. 

Recommend the team scale back and fix issues on the bottom before expanding scope.
title: Too many Errors and graphics missing

developerResponse:
{'id': 18110773, 'body': "Chix3n, we're extremely sorry for the inconvenience. We didn't fix the grammar issues as our main concern was to add value to your lives by putting out the content soon. We are working on to add more contents.

And we ask for the gender for personalizing our contents for you based on that. And the full name is required for you to receive a proper certificate.

If you have any other queries, please mail us at support@programming-hero.com and we'll be more than happy to assist you.

Grandma beat us yesterday. Nobody loves us. Please show us some love by giving 5 stars.
